abstract: World Trade Organization rules tax break offered by Washington State for aerospace industry was prohibited subsidy that benefited Boeing, third time taxpayer support for Boeing or its European competitor Airbus was faulted by WTO; decision is latest in ongoing dispute between two jet manufacturers over unfair trade advantages.
lead_paragraph: The W.T.O. ruling that a Washington State break for development of the 777X is a prohibited subsidy extends a trans-Atlantic spat involving Boeing and Airbus.
snippet: The W.T.O. ruling that a Washington State break for development of the 777X is a prohibited subsidy extends a trans-Atlantic spat involving Boeing and Airbus....

headline.main: World Trade Organization Rules Against Boeing Tax Break for New Jet
headline.print_headline: Trade Group Rules Against  Boeing on Tax Break for Jet
